parameter.name: destination
parameter.description: The location of the copied files.

parameter.name: filePattern
parameter.description: The pattern of the files to be copied.

parameter.name: setTimeout
parameter.description: Sets the timeout value on Jsch(Java Secure Channel) session.

parameter.name: setPassiveMode
parameter.description: Sets the passive mode to enter into passive mode.

parameter.name: setSoTimeout
parameter.description: Sets the socket timeout for the FTP client.

parameter.name: setStrictHostKeyChecking
parameter.description: Sets the host key checking to use.

parameter.name: setUserDirIsRoot
parameter.description: Sets the whether to use the user directory as root.

parameter.name: includeParentDirectory
parameter.description: Boolean type, indicating whether the parent directory will be included or not.

parameter.name: includeSubdirectories
parameter.description: Boolean type, indicating whether the sub directories will be included or not.
